t: r/webergrills on Reddit: Are the Weber grill covers worth it? Or should I buy Amazon knoff off?
s: April 29, 2024 - Weber covers used to be the well made and durable. Now they are expensive, low quality, but with the Weber brand. I bought Weber , Unicook, and Grillman covers on Amazon for a new Weber gas grill. Kept the Unicook - it costs less than half what the Weber costs.
